snippet.title: The Burst | Demo Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Demo. October 9th 2023. Steam Next Fest. Be there.
Wishlist The Burst on Steam: https://s.team/a/2073880
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Gorapid_Studio
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/ABkxTAQkPQ

About the game: The Burst is a smashing high-speed VR shooter from GoRapid Studio. Play as a Spec Ops operative thrown into a post-apocalyptic sci-fi world to bring down the tyrannical warband leader and her goons. Restore order on a prison planet the best way you can - with violence.
